scripts.sec:osv: node -e "const {spawnSync}=require('node:child_process'); const run=(cmd,args)=>spawnSync(cmd,args,{stdio:'inherit'}); const safeRun=(cmd,args)=>{try{return run(cmd,args);}catch(e){if(e.code==='ENOENT'){console.log('osv-scanner not installed; skipping'); return {status:0};} throw e;}}; const version=safeRun('osv-scanner',['--version']); if(version.status===0){const res=safeRun('osv-scanner',['-r','.']); process.exit(res.status ?? 0);} else {console.log('osv-scanner not installed; skipping');}"
scripts.sec:trivy: node -e "const {spawnSync}=require('node:child_process'); const run=(cmd,args)=>spawnSync(cmd,args,{stdio:'inherit'}); const safeRun=(cmd,args)=>{try{return run(cmd,args);}catch(e){if(e.code==='ENOENT'){console.log('trivy not installed; skipping'); return {status:0};} throw e;}}; const version=safeRun('trivy',['--version']); if(version.status===0){const res=safeRun('trivy',['fs','.','--scanners','vuln,secret','--skip-dirs','node_modules,dist,.next']); process.exit(res.status ?? 0);} else {console.log('trivy not installed; skipping');}"
scripts.sec:all: pnpm run sec:osv && pnpm run sec:trivy
